properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters of Southern Puerto Rico out 10 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 17 at 9:42PM AST until January 20 at 8:00PM AST by NWS San Juan PR
properties.description:
...NORTHERLY SWELL AND WIND-DRIVEN SEAS WILL GENERATE HAZARDOUS
SEAS ACROSS THE REGION BEGINNING TOMORROW...

.The combination of a northerly swell and wind-driven seas will
generate hazardous seas across the local waters tomorrow and
continuing through early next week. Fresh to strong winds and
frequent gusty winds are also expected during this period.

* WHAT...East winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and seas
7 to 14 feet expected.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters of Southern Puerto Rico out 10 NM.

* WHEN...From 8 AM Sunday to 8 PM AST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility. Conditions
will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM SUNDAY TO 8 PM AST MONDAY
